content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The structure consists of two separate constructions:

1. Left Tower Structure:
   - 7 blocks total: 3 yellow rectangular blocks, 2 orange cylindrical pillars, 1 red block with a hole, and 1 orange triangular roof
   - 4 layers from bottom to top

2. Right Structure:
   - 6 blocks total: 2 yellow rectangular blocks, 2 green rectangular blocks, 1 orange cylindrical pillar, and 1 orange triangular roof
   - 4 layers from bottom to top

## Spatial Relationships

### Left Tower Structure:
- Bottom (1st layer): Yellow rectangular block (horizontal orientation)
- 2nd layer: Red block with circular hole
- 3rd layer: Yellow rectangular block (horizontal orientation) with two orange cylinders standing on it
- Top (4th layer): Yellow rectangular block (horizontal orientation) with an orange triangular roof on top

### Right Structure:
- Bottom (1st layer): Green rectangular block (horizontal orientation)
- 2nd layer: Orange cylindrical pillar standing on the green base
- 3rd layer: Yellow rectangular block (horizontal orientation) with two green rectangular blocks (vertical orientation) at both ends
- Top (4th layer): Yellow rectangular block (horizontal orientation) with an orange triangular roof on one side

# Selection of Required Blocks

Based on my analysis, I need the following blocks from the dictionary:

1. Red block with hole (index 1) - appears once in the left structure
2. Yellow horizontal rectangular blocks (index 10) - appears 5 times (3 in left structure, 2 in right structure)
3. Orange cylindrical pillars (index 11 and index 13) - total of 3 (2 in left structure, 1 in right structure)
4. Orange triangular roofs (index 16) - appears twice (1 on each structure)
5. Green horizontal rectangular blocks (index 4 and index 9) - appear in the right structure
6. Green vertical rectangular blocks (index 6 and index 7) - appear in the right structure

# Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 10
   Step2: Move block with index 1
   Step3: Move block with index 10
   Step4: Move block with index 11
   Step5: Move block with index 13
   Step6: Move block with index 10
   Step7: Move block with index 16
   Step8: Move block with index 9
   Step9: Move block with index 11
   Step10: Move block with index 10
   Step11: Move block with index 6
   Step12: Move block with index 7
   Step13: Move block with index 10
   Step14: Move block with index 16
}
```
